content:
I'm so glad you're excited about the quilt plan!

It's great to hear that you're making progress on your lace shawl, too! Merino wool is a wonderful yarn to work with, and I'm sure your shawl will be beautiful and cozy. Lace patterns can be so mesmerizing, and the process of creating something delicate and intricate can be very therapeutic.

Since you're working on the shawl, I'm curious: are you a knitter or crocheter, or do you dabble in both? And what's the pattern like? Is it a simple, classic design or something more complex and intricate?

Feel free to share more about your shawl project, and I'll be happy to chat with you about it! Meanwhile, I'll be here, cheering you on as you work on your quilt and shawl.
